title.native: 夜のクラゲは泳げない
title.english: Jellyfish Can’t Swim in the Night

description:
"I want to find what I enjoy."

Shibuya is a city full of identity. It is here on Shibuya’s late night streets that illustrator Mahiru Kozuki, former idol Kano Yamanouchi, Vtuber Kiui Watase and composer Mei Kim Anouk Takanashi — four young women who are slightly outside the world — join together and form an anonymous artist group called JELEE. “I” also want to shine like someone else. If it's not me but “we” then we might be able to shine.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, HIDIVE, edited)

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.description: Centers around the art of drawing, including manga and doujinshi.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Transgender
tags.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

node.description:
__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yujikaneko)

Founder and representative director of Aoshashin.

edges.role: Theme Song Lyrics (ED1, ED2, ED3, ED4)

node.description:
__[Website](https://www.inametoru.com/) | [Blog (JP)](http://40meter.blog125.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/40mP) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/40meterP)__

__40meterP__, better known as 40mP, or alternatively known by alias Iname Tooru, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, arranger, composer, producer and illustrator. He uses the name 40mP when doing VOCALOID music composition, production and illustration, while as a singer-songwriter he uses the name Iname Tooru. 

His works usually exceed 100,000 views in average. His most popular songs are "Karakuri Pierrot" and "Ren'ai Saiban", both achieving over 10M views. He has produced the most #1 songs on the Weekly VOCALOID Ranking, with 27 songs. He also holds the record for the most songs to enter the Hall of Fame, with a total of 76 works. This producer has released work in the VOCALOID-P data series.

__[Website](http://www.kanoerana.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanoerana7) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanoerana/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kanoerana) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDKCyrXCr1W4zE-lOw7YBRQ) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kanoerana)__

__KanoeRana__ is a Japanese vocalist and lyricist under record labels KABECHORO (2018–) and KURAMAE RECORDS (2019–), having previously been under TAISUKE RECORDS (2015–2016) and Warner Music Japan (2016–2018). She made her first major debut on August 31, 2016, when she released her first mini album titled Kanoe Sanjou.

She currently actively releases small songs and covers to both her twitter and tiktok, which have made her quite renown in recent times.

__[Website](http://www.kanoerana.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanoerana7) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanoerana/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kanoerana) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDKCyrXCr1W4zE-lOw7YBRQ) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kanoerana)__

__KanoeRana__ is a Japanese vocalist and lyricist under record labels KABECHORO (2018–) and KURAMAE RECORDS (2019–), having previously been under TAISUKE RECORDS (2015–2016) and Warner Music Japan (2016–2018). She made her first major debut on August 31, 2016, when she released her first mini album titled Kanoe Sanjou.

She currently actively releases small songs and covers to both her twitter and tiktok, which have made her quite renown in recent times.

__[Artist Profile (Popholic)](https://popholic.jp/archives/author/ph-nagai)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/masa_olive)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/masamichi_nagai_bass/)__

__Birthplace:__ Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Introduction:__
Masamichi Nagai is a Japanese bassist, lyricist, composer and arranger, who uses his melodies and emotional worldviews to pierce the hearts of his listeners when creating his everyday works. His unique aggressive bass style is one of the characteristics that defines him as a musician.

__Biography:__
When Masamichi was in high school, he was impressed when he saw a friend playing in a band. This made him interested in music, which led him to picking up the bass guitar. Later on he engaged in a vocational music school, where he aimed to become a professional.

He was awarded the best bassist individual award, and the band's best award during an ensemble.

__[Website](http://www.kanoerana.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanoerana7) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanoerana/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/kanoerana) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDKCyrXCr1W4zE-lOw7YBRQ) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kanoerana)__

__KanoeRana__ is a Japanese vocalist and lyricist under record labels KABECHORO (2018–) and KURAMAE RECORDS (2019–), having previously been under TAISUKE RECORDS (2015–2016) and Warner Music Japan (2016–2018). She made her first major debut on August 31, 2016, when she released her first mini album titled Kanoe Sanjou.

She currently actively releases small songs and covers to both her twitter and tiktok, which have made her quite renown in recent times.
